mig.core

Class Lock

  • java.lang.Object
    • mig.core.Bolt
      • mig.core.Lock

  • public class Lock
extends Bolt
    Lock is the class that represents a key can unlocked a lock

    A Lock contains these elements :

    • A key, can fit into the lock

    If the key is compatible with the lock, the lock is unlocked

    If the key isn't compatible with the lock, the lock is locked

    Version:
    22/11/2016
    Author:
    Group8
    See Also:
    Bolt, Key, Code
